data.eml:eml: Redescription of Triatoma melanica Neiva & Lent, 1941, new status (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Triatominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Jane, Argolo, Ana Maria, Felix, Márcio (2006): Redescription of Triatoma melanica Neiva & Lent, 1941, new status (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Triatominae). Zootaxa 1385: 47-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175096
